# Secret Workshop (Spell)
## Overview
[[Abjuration Spells|Abjuration]]

**Level:** [[4th Level Medium Spells|Medium 4]], [[5th Level Mesmerist Spells|Mesmerist 5]], [[5th Level Occultist Spells|Occultist 5]], [[5th Level Psychic Spells|Psychic 5]], [[5th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 5]], [[5th Level Spiritualist Spells|Spiritualist 5]], [[5th Level Summoner Spells|Summoner 5]], [[5th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 5]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 10th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 10]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M (diamond dust worth 150 gp)

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Targets:** Any number of creatures or objects in range

**Duration:** 1 hour/level

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless, object)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless, object)

**Source:** Inner Sea Intrigue, pg. 60

Designed to protect a large number of items from rivals of the Arclords of Nex, this spell functions as *[[Nondetection (Spell)|nondetection]]* except as noted above. You can exclude any creatures or objects in the spellâ€™s range when casting this spell, if you wish.

**GM Note**

In the world of Golarion campaign setting, this spell is known as Nex's Secret Work Shop
